long_description: With a non-slip surface, this super-thick 4mm expanded vinyl mat offers excellent padding to minimize car-top abrasion. Expanded vinyl is PVC that is injected with tiny air-bubbles to create extra cushioing; reinforced yarns eliminate tearing and maximize durability. Easy to cut to any size. Can use as a trunk liner or anywhere else extra padding or non-slip surface is required. Nice neutral color.
short_description: With a non-slip surface, this super-thick 4mm expanded vinyl mat offers excellent padding to minimize car-top abrasion.
